reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one noting its early 80's disco glamour, and appreciate its amazing quality, flattering appearance, comfort, and suitability for night out occasions. The length receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it too short. The material quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising it while others describe it as cheap fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, feminine & flirty!
items.body: Wore this for a disco night at a bachelorette as well as new years and feel so fun & flirty in it! It’s a tiny bit short but just depends on your comfort level. Overall fit very well and better quality than I expected! ✨✨ Read more
items.author: Jay Corrine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good purchase
items.body: Lots of compliments. Super cute. Very short. Not sure how long it will last but it’s my go to decades night dress Read more
items.author: Alyssa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Glitzy and glammy
items.body: It’s a super fun dress but I ended up returning. I got the dress in 3 colors and 2 sizes but the black looked best on me but it was too small. The medium fit better but I didn’t order the black in the medium. It’s a bit short but dress it up with some knee high boots and you would be set. Too bad it didn’t work out for me. I returned all the dresses. I am 4”11, weight 130-135 lbs Read more
items.author: HandsomeGuy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Sleeves are a little too long for me but I’ll have them shortened Read more
items.author: Veronica

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too much material, not enough
items.body: Not flattering. I wore this for a Fairy godmother costume and it was too big. The back was too long and open in the back. Too much material. The front is awkward on the shoulders. Read more
items.author: Hayley Akel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty, size down. Had to return anyways
items.body: Found this on TikTok and it looks exactly like the photos. I’m a medium and I sized down to a small and it fit great but there was a manufacturing defect and one shoulder was sewn crooked and looked completely different and baggier than the other shoulder so I had to return it. If I had the time and patience, I probably would’ve returned it and ordered again and hoped for the best because I really like this dress. Read more
items.author: Hayley rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE
items.body: I recently attended a last-minute Galentine’s Day event and chose this dress, which turned out to be an absolute showstopper. The open-back design adds a touch of allure, while the front provides elegant coverage. The length is just right—flirty yet tasteful—and the bell sleeves lend a classy, modern flair. I received numerous compliments throughout the evening and am so impressed that I’m planning to purchase it in additional colors. Read more
items.author: Deanna Strzempek

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars I thought it was great till I wore it
items.body: I bought this for New Years Eve. It looked great when I left the house but I had notice the material from the inside pop out but I thought it was a fluke & fixed it. The bad thing was that the neckline was definitely sewn improperly. The non sparkly material kept popping out at the top on one side all night. It’s pretty but poorly made. I won’t wear it again due to the annoying issue. Read more
items.author: E. Gemma

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Dg, Leopard Print, Red Print, Hot Pink, Black, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
